Content: *p71858a0216*2  answer all questions. write your answers in the spaces provided.1 plant foods in the diet contain antioxidants, such as vitaminc. storage time and conditions affect the concentration of vitaminc in thesefoods.(a) explain how increasing the quantity of plant foods that contain vitaminc in the diet may protect against heartdisease.(3)
